section.heading: No agency power of member as member.

para.text: A member shall not be an agent of a limited liability company solely by reason of being a member.
A person’s status as a member shall not prevent or restrict law other than this chapter from imposing liability on a limited liability company because of the person’s conduct.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 301 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act).
